text: <a href="../2-Corinthians-6-1/" title="2 Corinthians 6:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 We then, *as* workers together *with him*, beseech *you* also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-2/" title="2 Corinthians 6:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 (For he saith, I have heard thee in a time accepted, and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee: behold, now *is* the accepted time; behold, now *is* the day of salvation.)
<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-3/" title="2 Corinthians 6:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Giving no offence in any thing, that the ministry be not blamed:

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-4/" title="2 Corinthians 6:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 But in all *things* approving ourselves as the ministers of God, in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in distresses,
<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-5/" title="2 Corinthians 6:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 In stripes, in imprisonments, in tumults, in labours, in watchings, in fastings;

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-6/" title="2 Corinthians 6:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 By pureness, by knowledge, by longsuffering, by kindness, by the Holy Ghost, by love unfeigned,

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-7/" title="2 Corinthians 6:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 By the word of truth, by the power of God, by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,
<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-8/" title="2 Corinthians 6:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report: as deceivers, and *yet* true;

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-9/" title="2 Corinthians 6:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 As unknown, and *yet* well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-10/" title="2 Corinthians 6:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and *yet* possessing all things.
<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-11/" title="2 Corinthians 6:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 O *ye* Corinthians, our mouth is open unto you, our heart is enlarged.
<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-12/" title="2 Corinthians 6:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Ye are not straitened in us, but ye are straitened in your own bowels.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-13/" title="2 Corinthians 6:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Now for a recompence in the same, (I speak as unto *my* children,) be ye also enlarged.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-14/" title="2 Corinthians 6:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-15/" title="2 Corinthians 6:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel?

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-16/" title="2 Corinthians 6:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in *them*; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-17/" title="2 Corinthians 6:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean *thing*; and I will receive you,

<a href="../2-Corinthians-6-18/" title="2 Corinthians 6:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
